info.title: Postmark API
info.description:
Postmark makes sending and receiving email
incredibly easy.

parameters.name: X-Postmark-Server-Token
parameters.description: The token associated with the Server on which this request will operate.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of bounces to return per request. Max 500.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of bounces to skip.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by type of bounce

parameters.name: inactive
parameters.description: Filter by emails that were deactivated by Postmark due to the bounce. Set to true or false. If this isn't specified it will return both active and inactive.

parameters.name: emailFilter
parameters.description: Filter by email address

parameters.name: messageID
parameters.description: Filter by messageID

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter by tag

parameters.name: todate
parameters.description: Filter messages up to the date specified. e.g. `2014-02-01`

parameters.name: fromdate
parameters.description: Filter messages starting from the date specified. e.g. `2014-02-01`

422.description: An error was generated due to incorrect use of the API. See the Message associated with this response for more information.

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.

parameters.name: X-Postmark-Server-Token
parameters.description: The token associated with the Server on which this request will operate.

parameters.name: bounceid
parameters.description: The ID of the bounce to retrieve.

post.summary: Send an email using a Template

parameters.name: X-Postmark-Server-Token
parameters.description: The token associated with the Server on which this request will operate.

422.description: An error was generated due to incorrect use of the API. See the Message associated with this response for more information.

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.

parameters.name: X-Postmark-Server-Token
parameters.description: The token associated with the Server on which this request will operate.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of messages to return per request. Max 500.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of messages to skip

parameters.name: recipient
parameters.description: Filter by the user who was receiving the email

parameters.name: fromemail
parameters.description: Filter by the sender email address

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Filter by email subject

parameters.name: mailboxhash
parameters.description: Filter by mailboxhash

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter by tag

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status (`blocked`, `processed`, `queued`, `failed`, `scheduled`)

parameters.name: todate
parameters.description: Filter messages up to the date specified. e.g. `2014-02-01`

parameters.name: fromdate
parameters.description: Filter messages starting from the date specified. e.g. `2014-02-01`

422.description: An error was generated due to incorrect use of the API. See the Message associated with this response for more information.

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.

put.summary: Bypass rules for a blocked inbound message

parameters.description: The token associated with the Server on which this request will operate.

parameters.name: messageid
parameters.description: The ID of the message which should bypass inbound rules.

parameters.name: messageid
parameters.description: The ID of the message for which to details will be retrieved.

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.

put.summary: Retry a failed inbound message for processing

parameters.name: X-Postmark-Server-Token
parameters.description: The token associated with the Server on which this request will operate.

parameters.name: messageid
parameters.description: The ID of the inbound message on which we should retry processing.

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.

parameters.name: X-Postmark-Server-Token
parameters.description: The token associated with the Server on which this request will operate.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of messages to return per request. Max 500.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of messages to skip

parameters.name: recipient
parameters.description: Filter by the user who was receiving the email

parameters.name: fromemail
parameters.description: Filter by the sender email address

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter by tag

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status (`queued` or `sent`)

parameters.name: todate
parameters.description: Filter messages up to the date specified. e.g. `2014-02-01`

parameters.name: fromdate
parameters.description: Filter messages starting from the date specified. e.g. `2014-02-01`

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.

parameters.name: X-Postmark-Server-Token
parameters.description: The token associated with the Server on which this request will operate.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of message clicks to return per request. Max 500.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of messages to skip

parameters.name: recipient
parameters.description: Filter by To, Cc, Bcc

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter by tag

parameters.name: client_name
parameters.description: Filter by client name, i.e. Outlook, Gmail

parameters.name: client_company
parameters.description: Filter by company, i.e. Microsoft, Apple, Google

parameters.name: client_family
parameters.description: Filter by client family, i.e. OS X, Chrome

parameters.name: os_name
parameters.description: Filter by full OS name and specific version, i.e. OS X 10.9 Mavericks, Windows 7

parameters.name: os_family
parameters.description: Filter by kind of OS used without specific version, i.e. OS X, Windows

parameters.name: os_company
parameters.description: Filter by company which produced the OS, i.e. Apple Computer, Inc., Microsoft Corporation

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Filter by platform, i.e. webmail, desktop, mobile

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Filter by country messages were opened in, i.e. Denmark, Russia

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Filter by full name of region messages were opened in, i.e. Moscow, New York

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Filter by full name of region messages were opened in, i.e. Moscow, New York

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.

Attachment.description: An attachment for an email message.

Body.description: Raw source of bounce. If no dump is available this will return an empty string.

Alias.description: The optional string identifier for referring to this Template (numbers, letters, and '.', '-', '_' characters, starts with a letter).

HtmlBody.description: The HTML template definition for this Template.

Name.description: The friendly display name for the template.

Subject.description: The Subject template definition for this Template.

TextBody.description: The Text template definition for this Template.

CreateTemplateRequest.description: The contents required for creating a new template.

DynamicResponse.description: The properties of this object will vary based request parameters.

ClickHookUrl.description: Webhook url allowing real-time notification when tracked links are clicked.

Alias.description: The optional string identifier for referring to this Template (numbers, letters, and '.', '-', '_' characters, starts with a letter).

HtmlBody.description: The HTML template definition for this Template.

Name.description: The friendly display name for the template.

Subject.description: The Subject template definition for this Template.

TextBody.description: The Text template definition for this Template.

EditTemplateRequest.description: The contents required for creating a new template.

TrackLinks.description: Replace links in content to enable "click tracking" stats. Default is 'null', which uses the server's LinkTracking setting'.

TrackOpens.description: Activate open tracking for this email.

MessageHeader.description: A single header for an email message.

Body.description: Raw source of message. If no dump is available this will return an empty string.

Bcc.description: Bcc recipient email address. Multiple addresses are comma seperated. Max 50.

Cc.description: Recipient email address. Multiple addresses are comma seperated. Max 50.

From.description: The sender email address. Must have a registered and confirmed Sender Signature.

HtmlBody.description: If no TextBody specified HTML email message

ReplyTo.description: Reply To override email address. Defaults to the Reply To set in the sender signature.

Tag.description: Email tag that allows you to categorize outgoing emails and get detailed statistics.

TextBody.description: If no HtmlBody specified Plain text email message

To.description: Recipient email address. Multiple addresses are comma seperated. Max 50.

TrackLinks.description: Replace links in content to enable "click tracking" stats. Default is 'null', which uses the server's LinkTracking setting'.

TrackOpens.description: Activate open tracking for this email.

SendEmailResponse.description: The standard response when a postmark message is sent

SentCountsResponse.description: The result of a get sent counts operation.

Active.description: Indicates that this template may be used for sending email.

Alias.description: The user-supplied alias for this template.

AssociatedServerId.description: The ID of the Server with which this template is associated.

HtmlBody.description: The content to use for the HtmlBody when this template is used to send email.

Name.description: The display name for the template.

Subject.description: The content to use for the Subject when this template is used to send email.

TemplateID.description: The ID associated with the template.

TextBody.description: The content to use for the TextBody when this template is used to send email.

Templates API.description: Basic information for each Template returned from the query.

TotalCount.description: The total number of Templates API associated with this server.

Active.description: True if this template is currently available for use.

Alias.description: The user-supplied alias for this template.

Name.description: The display name for this template.

TemplateId.description: The associated ID for this template.

HtmlBody.description:
The html body content to validate. Must be specified if Subject or
TextBody are not. See our template language documentation for more
information on the syntax for this field.

InlineCssForHtmlTestRender.description:
When HtmlBody is specified, the test render will have style blocks
inlined as style attributes on matching html elements. You may disable
the css inlining behavior by passing false for this parameter.

Subject.description:
The subject content to validate. Must be specified if HtmlBody or
TextBody are not. See our template language documentation for more
information on the syntax for this field.

TestRenderModel.description: The model to be used when rendering test content.

TextBody.description:
The text body content to validate. Must be specified if HtmlBody or
Subject are not. See our template language documentation for more
information on the syntax for this field.

422.description: An error was generated due to incorrect use of the API. See the Message associated with this response for more information.

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.
